title: I am heading to class 12. Will any guy suggest books or any other advice for cracking the NEET? - Quora

response.answer_text: That's good to hear. To crack NEET focus on your CBSE text books,be very thorough within your periodic schooling. It's a foundation to cracking it.After that you can probably look for some books like HC VERMA PHYSICS,ARIHANT etc. also solve previous year question papers as much as you can. From here it's your journey. I bet you can pass at one go. God bless!!
